sentences.sContent: Remember not to mention your discontent.
sentences.sCn: 记住，不要提到你对工作的不满。

sentences.sContent: Of all the workers in the country bituminous miners probably had best grounds for discontent.
sentences.sContent_eng: Of all the workers in the country bituminous miners probably had best grounds for discontent.
sentences.sCn: 在全国所有的工人中，可能烟煤矿工不满的理由最充分。

words.tran: 不满意（discontent的过去式及过去分词）

trans.tranOther: a feeling of being unhappy and not satisfied with the situation you are in
